import ListOfElements from '../../components/ListOfElements' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Error404 from '../404' import Menu from '../../components/Menu' import { useHandleClickMovie } from '../../hooks/handleClickMovie' import { useLocation } from 'wouter' export default async function SearchMovies({ params }) { const keyword = params const [, pathLocation] = useLocation() const {handleClick, parameter} = useHandleClickMovie(keyword) const list = { 'HOME': '/', 'MOVIES': `/search/movie/${params.keyword}`, 'SERIES': `/search/serie/${params.keyword}`, 'GAMES': '' } if (parameter.length === 0) { return } return
}
